# Next.js Project with PostgreSQL

## Project Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Customize the Project
- [x] Install Required Extensions
- [x] Compile the Project
- [x] Create and Run Task
- [x] Launch the Project
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Project Description
A Next.js web application with Node.js backend, prepared for PostgreSQL database integration.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js (React framework) v15.5.9
- TypeScript v5
- Node.js
- PostgreSQL (to be integrated later)
- Tailwind CSS v3.4
- ESLint

## Development Server
The project is running at:
- Local: http://localhost:3000
- Network: http://192.168.56.1:3000

## Getting Started
```bash
# Install dependencies
npm install

# Run development server
npm run dev

# Build for production
npm run build

# Start production server
npm start
```

## Current Status
✅ Project scaffolded successfully
✅ All dependencies installed
✅ Development server running
✅ "Hello World" page displaying at http://localhost:3000
